title: Angela's Place
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Peruvian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurante vegetariano serving whole grain bread, apple strudel, fresh fruit juices, hummus, burritos, falafel, quinoa with vegetables, soup, spinach pastry, and more. All food vegetarian except for one dish. Also offering book exchange and tourist information. Vegans please inquire about options and inform HappyCow.
